org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl

类 X_COMMON_Impl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl.BufferImpl
      • org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl.X_COMMON_Impl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Buffer, X_COMMON

    public class X_COMMON_Impl
extends BufferImpl
implements X_COMMON
    The X_COMMON buffer type supports a subset of the types provided by the X_C_TYPE buffer in order to support more language portable data exchange.
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.xatmi.impl.BufferImpl

      The constructor is hidden as a Connection should be used to allocate the object.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • X_COMMON_Impl

        public X_COMMON_Impl(String subtype)
              throws ConnectionException,
                     org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException
        The constructor is hidden as a Connection should be used to allocate the object. ConnectionImpl#tpalloc(String, String)
        参数:
        subtype - The subtype of the buffer, must be registered in the configuration
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - In case the buffer cannot be created.
        org.jboss.narayana.blacktie.jatmibroker.core.conf.ConfigurationException

    • 方法详细资料

      • getShort

        public short getShort(String key)
               throws ConnectionException
        Get the short value identified by the key.
        指定者:
        getShort 在接口中 X_COMMON
        参数:
        key - The key to use
        返回:
        The short value
        抛出:
        ConnectionException - In case the key is not part of the structure.
